tap_to_accept: Tap "Agree and continue" to accept the

name: Name
desk: To easily verify numbers and send messages to friends and family, let Appskabs access your contact list.
desk_del: Are you sure you want to delete this message?

exit: Do you want to leave the group
leave: Only group admins will be notified if you leave the group.

reset: Password reset email has been sent!

correctly: Please fill in all fields correctly.

already_been_used: Phone Number or Email has been used.

enter_otp: Enter the OTP code you received via SMS in

time: seconds, the code will be sent automatically via SMS.

other_member: Other members will not see that you have disabled this chat. You will still be notified if you are mentioned.
will_be_notified: You will be notified of all messages in this chat.
as_seen: Failed to mark status as seen

admins_will_be_notified: Only group admins will be notified if you leave the group.
alert_logout: You need to log in again if you want to continue your previous activity.
